sample_docs: Join Us at ICPA 2025 Showcasing innovative prison and security solutions. Committed to safer societies with holistic biometric intelligence since 2012. Beyond Biometrics, Holistic Intelligence Backed by innovation and advanced expertise, our solutions empower safer societies and smarter systems — today and tomorrow. Beyond Biometrics, Holistic Intelligence From AI-powered analytics to mobile field solutions, Papilon bridges forward-thinking technologies with the evolving demands of today's world. Beyond Biometrics, Holistic Intelligence Papilon delivers forensic and civil technologies designed to meet the fast-changing needs of both public institutions and private organizations. Products See All See All Blogs More What is Vehicle Recognition System? The increasing demand for fuel purchases results in the search for more effective ways in fuel purchasing operations. Access Control Systems Access control systems are the most important factor enabling authorized persons to pass through doors and turnstiles in laboratories, nuclear facilities, military facilities, and companies. Let's take a closer look at this structure. Biometrics 101 Most of the time we can't even recognize it, but still, it happens. Even when we see each others' faces, biometrics comes into play. What is Biometrics? It has happened to almost all of us; biometric photographs are requested for driver's licenses, ID cards, and passports. So what is biometrics? What is Artificial Intelligence? Robots that behave like humans, computers that defeat world champions in chess, driverless vehicles, chatbots.. Fingerprint Scanner What is a fingerprint? Patterns also called "papilla", form shapes called fingerprints. What is Digital Onboarding? Online accounts created in a short period through biometric authentication are protected by several standards. What is a Face Recognition System? Today, facial recognition systems used in numerous areas mainly serve to identify and verify people through facial information. What is Iris Recognition System? Iris recognition systems use the iris layer in our eyes. The colored muscle layer around the pupil is called the iris. What is ABIS? ABIS is the abbreviation of Automated Biometric Identification System. ABIS is a software that stores and identifies large-scale biometric data. Media Agencies In today's rapidly changing world, media agencies have to scan millions of data.
